domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: State of the Union
entity.description: Hosted by CNN's chief Washington correspondent Jake Tapper and journalist Dana Bash, "State of the Union" features one-on-one interviews with top newsmakers on politics and policy. Often joined by a round table of expert guests, the Sunday morning program covers Washington, the country, and the world, and goes beyond the Beltway for a perspective on how everyday Americans are faring.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text:
House Speaker Nancy Pelosi says the President downplaying the severity of coronavirus is “deadly."

“As the President fiddles, people are dying. We just have to take every precaution.” #CNNSOTU https://t.co/nZCmCB12jG
